info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 22941
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;aplypro.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 22941
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;aplypro.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
aplypro.beta.gouv.fr.	60	IN	SOA	dns107.ovh.net. tech.ovh.net. 2023102306 86400 3600 3600000 60

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 18437
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;aplypro.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 18437
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;aplypro.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
aplypro.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	ns107.ovh.net.
aplypro.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	dns107.ovh.net.

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 487
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;aplypro.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 487
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;aplypro.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
aplypro.beta.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"1|www.aplypro.beta.gouv.fr"
aplypro.beta.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:mx.ovh.com -all"

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 14858
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;aplypro.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 14858
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 3, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;aplypro.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
aplypro.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	MX	5 mx2.mail.ovh.net.
aplypro.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	MX	100 mx3.mail.ovh.net.
aplypro.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	MX	1 mx1.mail.ovh.net.

Direction Interministérielle du Numérique

APLyPro

Application pour les lycéens professionnels

APLyPro n'est pas disponible pour le moment.

–

Foire aux questions

Quand aurais-je accès à l'application ?

Vous serez notifiés dès que l'application sera disponible.

Mes élèves sont déjà partis en stage, puis-je saisir des stages sur APLyPro à prosteriori ?

Les stages peuvent être saisis à posteriori.

Quand mes élèves vont-ils être payés ?

Les paiements débuteront en 2024. Mais vous pourrez quand même saisir toutes les informations nécessaires à l'avance, dès que l'application sera disponible.

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
